abstract: Comcast, one of the country’s largest Internet providers, will put a 250 gigabyte-a-month cap on residential users, a move certain to create tension.
snippet: Comcast, one of the country’s largest Internet providers, will put a 250 gigabyte-a-month cap on residential users, a move certain to create tension.
lead_paragraph: Comcast, one of the country’s largest Internet providers, said this week that it would place limits on customers’ broadband usage.

headline.main: Comcast to Place a Cap on Internet Downloads
headline.print_headline: Comcast to Place a Cap On Internet Downloads
